tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE FoodWasteData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_item TEXT,
    amount_purchased DECIMAL,
    amount_wasted DECIMAL,
    location TEXT,
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE WasteAnalysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    food_item_id INT,
    waste_category VARCHAR(50),
    analysis_date DATE,
    quantity_wasted INT
);

CREATE TABLE FoodWasteData (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  item_name VARCHAR(255),
  quantity DECIMAL,
  date_recorded DATE
)

CREATE TABLE FoodCategories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE WasteLocations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location_name VARCHAR(255),
  address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ReductionOpportunities (
  opportunity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  opportunity_description TEXT,
  cost_savings DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE WasteAnalysis (
  analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_location_id INT,
  analysis_date DATE,
  waste_category_id INT,
  waste_quantity DECIMAL
)
